name: Legislator Search
author: Flapjack Labs

sections.description:
This plugin adds an AJAX-enabled widget that allows users to quickly and easily search for congressional legislators
by zip code.

This plugin requires a Sunlight Labs API key.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Unzip and upload legislator_search to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Where Can I Obtain a Sunlight Labs API Key?

http://services.sunlightlabs.com/accounts/register/

short_description: Adds a widget that allows users to search for their US congressional legislators.  Requires a Sunlight Labs API Key.
